languages.text: "С твоим ремеслом я бы просил{mf||а} обещание, что, если у тебя случится беда, я приду на выручку".
"Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."
languages.original_text: "С твоим ремеслом я бы просил{mf||а} обещание, что, если у тебя случится беда, я приду на выручку".

traits.locale_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."
"Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."
"Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."
"Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

languages.text: “考虑到你这一行，我可以向你保证：如果你以后遇到了什么麻烦，我一定会帮你的忙。”
languages.original_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到你这一行，我可以向你保证：如果你以后遇到了什么麻烦，我一定会帮你的忙。”

languages.text: 「将来の立場を考えれば、今後トラブルに見舞われた時に、私の援助を約束してもらいたいものだ」
languages.original_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

traits.locale_text: 「将来の立場を考えれば、今後トラブルに見舞われた時に、私の援助を約束してもらいたいものだ」

languages.text: «Dada su profesión, obtendría de mí una promesa de ayuda si se encontrara en apuros en cualquier momento».
languages.original_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

traits.locale_text: «Dada su profesión, obtendría de mí una promesa de ayuda si se encontrara en apuros en cualquier momento».

languages.text: « Au vu de votre profession, vous devriez me faire promettre de vous aider si jamais vous rencontrez des problèmes à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

traits.locale_text: « Au vu de votre profession, vous devriez me faire promettre de vous aider si jamais vous rencontrez des problèmes à l'avenir. »

languages.text: "Wenn ich da an Euren Beruf denke – ich würde Euch meine Hilfe anbieten, solltet Ihr sie in Zukunft einmal benötigen."
languages.original_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich da an Euren Beruf denke – ich würde Euch meine Hilfe anbieten, solltet Ihr sie in Zukunft einmal benötigen."

languages.text: "Mesleğini göz önünde bulunduruyorum da... Yerinde olsam, gelecekte sıkıntıya düştüğünde sana destek vereceğimin sözünü alırdım."
languages.original_text: "Given your profession, I would extract a promise of my assistance should you ever find yourself in trouble in the future."

traits.locale_text: "Mesleğini göz önünde bulundurursak, yerinde olsam, gelecekte sıkıntıya düştüğünde sana destek vereceğimin sözünü alırdım."
